item.title: Code Review: Rspec Tests
item.description: I am writing a rails application for my mom to enter her bakery orders for her business. The Order page has a form to search or add a new customer, so i can streamline the process as much as possible. In the Order create method, I either get a customer array or a customer ID. Here's the order create method in the controller: def create new_customer = params[:order][:customer_id].blank? ? true : false if new_customer @customer = Customer.
